reviewText: dont find it apt enough , difficult to get unenrolled pls cancel subscription to this course immediately and confirm , asap
Very poor english make it very difficult to work through course.

I was very difficult to follow the videos due to the quality of English language spoken. I had to follow the transcripts in order to fully understand what was being said.I also found it very hard to stay motivated throughout the course and often was left without a clear understanding of what I'd learnt and how relevant it was. The result of this was that I chose not to do the final exam since I thought I'd committed enough time during the learning phases.Some of the reading was not easily available online and required signing up to other websites. Not ideal.
Poca información de valor :(

Very redundant, boring at times. It has useful information though. It is just difficult to keep up with so much repetition and sales theory. I do not care much about the schools of thought in sales and the history of sales. I want to be a topnotch Sales Manager or Sales Director!
not applicable to mevery basic corporate knowledgerather not suitable for senior people who are supposed to really design the strategy

The teachers are doing wonderful job with the content but the accent is a bit challenging at some times. Also rather than long texts as reading material, if they provide presentation with topics it is very useful to learn faster.

Good information. I felt that the final assignment was the first time to apply the skills learned int he course. It would have been nice to have small activities to apply the skills each week along side the quizzes.

I sat through week 1,  but the topics to me are feeling so theory oriented , they have tried to do a great job make it interesting. Then it gets to you, a bit too much for strategy, not sure I will continue.

The overview were good and i learned quite well, mainly from the interviews, listen their points and experiences is a difference, but i feel a little frustrated when i see the professors reading the texts, it's kind robotic.
great course
very well down and structured.readings and material are well connected and applicable to real life cases.
The transcript is missing sometimes and also so infographics related to the course. The content is very good and even better when used to solve the given business case.
Great information, but videos can sometimes become very long and boring. Some teachers don't even try to make the content more pleasing.
Great course!  has to rewind  videos a lot because of language tone but very good content
Instructors in videos are reading the script over a screen, that made it less efficient to transfer the information. I believe they should prepare and talk free like a live presentation. thanks
The English can be a bit hard to follow in the videos sometimes, but overall a very effective intro level sales and strategy course for managers
Very cool course I enjoyed it and was able to use what i learnt in my job
"overview" is an exact word cuz the brief instruction method is the main contents in this course, hope next session will be more case analysis to help us to use.
Good course, for beginners and mid-level sales professionals
V. Good course
I​nsightful and educative

I consider this FIA course the most comprehensive and complete within the program of integrated courses on Coursera, with important systemic view and practice of very important points, among them, sales strategy, sales planning, sales techniques and sales team management. A very important technical leap in my sales career.I definitely recommend this course.
good
I would not have found such a course in my own country. It was a really great and instructive course.
Excellent course! Love it and recommended to everyone!
Great overview regarding sales!

this is an amazing course for those who wantd to have sales as their career.

Very useful, practical and engaging. I loved the structure, material and especially the instructors. I use all the learned concepts very easy in my daily job and I am very happy I took the course. I suggest it warmly To all those interested in sales.
Good insight on realistic cases and references
Course help me to understand concept with deep analysis.
Very informatics study materiel and coach, This will definitely help for better understanding, and upgrade the profession
Very Good!
good course as an introduction to sales strategy and salesforce effectiveness.

It was a great time in an online lecture. I have no experience with the sales and strategy this class is good for beginners who have no idea about sales strategy is. I have learned how the sales process should be, how to cooperate and sales understand each other and improve profits.
Excellent course for those who want to grow up in their career as well as business.. Thanks

Most professional and informative for faculty and sales

Awesome course and successful material for Sales Specialization. I recommend this to all the sales guys/peers in this community.keep learning!!!
very good course
Am very pleased with all the selling skills i have acquired from this course and i can proudly say that i feel more confident to embark on my sales career
Thank you
This course gives a good insight into the corporate strategies and its implementation thru the sales functions... a must for the aspiring sales guys
very good

The content is very well organized, the assignments are challenging (Specially the final one) and it really helped me in my career, so it's definitely a course which sales people should take. The spoken English is the weak point, sometimes it's hard to understand the heavy accents, but there are transcripts which help a lot.
Great Course!!... The concepts reviewed are so easy to understand and yet so critical to develop a proper Sales Strategy. It opens your mind to evaluate any sales challenge from different angles.
Good learning
Excelente introducción.
nice course
THANK YOU FOR A GREAT KNOWLEDGE GIVEN!
This is the course which teaches the student from the scratch and covers all the basic topics. Best course for a sales person.

Course comprises really valuable content and highly recommended for those who are taking first steps in sales and marketing. I really learned so much useful information regarding to sales. Highly recommended course.
Exceptional learning and teaching aid with precision on relevant topics
Personally speaking, this course is very useful for people that want to learn basic conceptos about sales. I really recommend it!
I really enjoy that course, it provides not only information, bur also a lot of clues where to dig deeper to become a Sales Professional.
The first week was very good !!!
Excellent course for the person who wants to start there career in sales.
Very interesting content, the subject will help me at my professional life.
Well done.  Great course and amazing instructor!
Excellent!
An excellent approach! Very helpful.
Excellent course and professors, learning a lot. Highly recommended!

This is an excellent course beyond any doubt. I can only appreciate the care with which the course had been designed and executed. There is a lot of good topics that I can mention. Some touches of comedy, sufficient amount of outside read and a Nice discussion between the characters to illustrate some situations of real life.
Very useful for me to build a structured knowledge about sales management.
